This action-packed movie stars Bruce Willis and Morgan Freeman, and its plot revolves around a group of retired special forces operatives who reunite to take down a common enemy.

conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: What's the mood of 2010? Maybe I’m overthinking it, but it sounds fascinating.

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: Given your preference for a movie from 2010, revolving around revenge and starring James Pickens Jr., I'd recommend "Black Swan". This psychological thriller follows a ballet dancer (Natalie Portman) as she struggles with her inner demons and external pressures. Although James Pickens Jr. isn't the lead actor, he has a supporting role in this highly acclaimed film.
